wikipedia_page.main: Rob Hill (born 11 June 1967) is a British former field hockey player who competed in the 1992 Summer Olympics.He now plays for Mighty 4s at Eastbourne Hockey club (he won the most improved player in 2017) and also works at Eastbourne College as Director of Hockey. He is currently house master of Wargrave House. He used to teach at Sherborne School.

response: * Rob Hill (field hockey) (born 1967), British field hockey player
